titleStmt.title: The deceyte of women, to the instruction and ensample of all men yonge and olde, newly corrected.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Paules Churche yarde at the sygne of the Lambe, by [W. Copland for] Abraham Vele],

notesStmt.note: Partly translated from "Les cent nouvelles nouvelles" (STC).
Printer's name and suggested publication date from STC. Imprint from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
